alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 11:02AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with the higher amounts on the southern end of the the range. Winds gusting 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains West and Bighorn Mountains Southeast. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible as the snow and wind combine to create reduced visibility and drifting.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
